fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs

Interface IFileSystemView


  • public interface IFileSystemView
    View of a physical or virtual filesystem using abstract relative paths.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPath getPath(String path)
      Gets a structured path for this filesystem, specified as a string.
      IPath getRoot()
      Gets the root path.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoot

        IPath getRoot()
        Gets the root path. This is equivalent to calling getPath("/").
        Returns:
        the non-null root path.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPath

        IPath getPath(String path)
        Gets a structured path for this filesystem, specified as a string.
        Parameters:
        path - non-null valid path as a string, starting with "/". The path does not need to exist, it just needs to be syntactically correct.
        Returns:
        the non-null structured path.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the path is invalid (null or incorrectly formatted).
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IPath.isFile(), IPath.isFolder()
